content: oversew the side edges together adding stuffing as you sew and row 14 to 42 starting on a ws purl row work 29 gather the cast on sts together at the bottom row in stockinette block the leaves weave in all yarn tails apart from row 43 k15 transfer the last 15 sts onto the stitch the cast on tail thread the cast on tail onto a holder 15 sts tapestry needle and gather the cast on sts together then sew the side edges of the stalk work the tip of the first leaf on the 15 sts on your together in mattress stitch row 1 to 8 place the knitting needle with the green working yarn cob inside the leaves so that the cast on edge of row 44 to 54 starting on a ws purl row work 11 the cob is covered by the stalk use green yarn row in stockinette and a running back stitch to sew the side edges row 55 k1 ssk k9 k2tog k1 13 sts of the leaves onto the cob from the stalk at the bottom up to about 4 row above the eyes so that row 56 to 58 starting on a ws purl row work 3 the tips of the leaves can fold over row in stockinette sweetcorn page 3 of 3 copyright © 2020 amanda berry
